item.title: Need for Speed: Benchmarks on Dataframes
item.description: via GIPHY In this post, I will explore the execution speed of various implementations of dataframe aggregation and combining operations in R. I will record timings using microbenchmark, a package for measuring the performance of very small pieces of R code.
